      Returns:

    • inBook

      Parameters:
      zobrist - hash with the position
      Returns:
      true if at least one entry is found, false otherwise

    • getRandomMove

      public String getRandomMove(long zobrist)
      for given zobrist, get all stored moves from the book and select a random move from the possible choices. Return null if there is no move. The random choice has a bias w.r.t. the number of times a move has been played (popular moves are preferred)
      Parameters:
      zobrist - the position in question
      Returns:
      a random move, encoded as a uci string
